participant_1.background:
I will do laundry and spend time with my family.
i like candy and soda.
I am an Indian-American wedding photographer.
i am allergic to milk.
i hate that i got my brain from the dad i never met.

participant_2.background:
I love dressing up in hunter green, even if it makes my family laugh.
we have two sons.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
i am a full time mom.
i have a poodle named nanette.

content.text: I am doing good, thank you for asking! What about you?
I am doing well too! I am currently a photographer for Indian-American wedding events.
Oh that sounds really cool! I love weddings. I am a full time mom of two boys and I love dressing in hunter green, even if my family laughs at me.
That is great to hear! I have two sons as well. I love spending time with my family and I love listening to Jason Mraz's music.
I love Jason Mraz's music as well! His music helps me cope with the loss of my parents.
I am sorry to hear about the loss of your parents. I am sure they are very proud of the person you have become.
Thank you. I appreciate that. I also have a poodle named Nanette.
That is great! I love dogs. I have a cat named Mittens.
I love cats too! Mittens is a great name for a cat.
Thank you! I am glad to meet you. I think we would be great friends.
I think so too! I am glad to meet you as well
